name: Trololo: The Game
summary: Choose your character and dance on the Trololo Set or try out the new Conan Set. Straight from the tv show "Conan" on TBS, the Conan Set contains a nice ocean view as well as a "piece of moon rock" which can be moved around as you dance to the "Conan" theme song as one of the three characters. You can also choose whether you want Conan pre or post Beardpocolypse.
